title: How To Take A Bra Off With One Hand

The Natural Lifestyles is the leading elite dating company on the planet. We give dating advice to guys for over a decade with phenomenal results. Our live workshops in New York, Barcelona, Melbourne, Sydney, Budapest etc. are highly requested and offer a life changing experience! Only around 80 guys can be taught live each year.

channel_info.description: James Marshall, Shae Matthews, Alex León, & Virag Tierra bring you dating videos on how to be natural with women, improve your confidence and go for what you want in life.

transcription: So to take a bra off with one hand is a bit of a skill and it's definitely one worth figuring out. So what I'm using is I'm using my middle finger and my thumb. Okay so there's the divide so you can feel and I find the divide. I'm going to place the middle finger right between the two eyelets of the bra, press into the body a little bit and then I use the thumb to just like so flick it off. Then I run my hands up to the straps, take them off and then the bra just drops. It's all in one motion, it goes quick, drop like so, comes off very easily. So if you find yourself in a situation where you've got a girl wearing a corset or something with multiple eyelets, it's the same as the bra, we just start at the top and we just start bunching them off like that.
